problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
int u = 5;
double v = 5.5;
if( v > u )
  System. out. print ( 1 );
if( (int)v > u )
  System. out. print ( 2 );
else
  System.out.print( 3 );

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
double m = 1.5;
double n = 2.5;

if( m > n )
  n *= 2;
else
  m *= 2;

if( m > 2 )
  System.out.print( 1 );
else
  System.out.print( 2 );

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
int x = 8;
int y = 4 * 2;
if( x == y ){
  if( x % 2 == 0 )
    x--;
  else
    y++;
}
System.out.print( x + " " + y );

problem.code:

if ( x > 10 )
  result += "a";
if( y > 10 )
  result += "a";
System.out.println( result.length() );

problem.question: What is output by the client code to the right?
problem.code:
public int off(int month){
  int result = -4;
  switch( month ){
    case 1: result = -3; break;
    case 3: case 5: case 8: case 10:
      result = -1; break;
    default: result = 0;
  }
  return result;
}

// client code
System.out.print( off(1) + off(7) );

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
String vals = "abac";
int total = 0;
char ch;
for( int i = 0; i < vals.length(); i++){
  ch = vals.charAt(i);
  switch ( ch ) {
    case 'a' : total++; break;
    case 'b' : total *= 2; break;
    default : total--;
  }
}

System.out.print( total );

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
int x = 15;
switch(x) {
case 14: out.print("Hi ");
case 15: out.print("Chicken ");
case 16: out.print("Bob ");
default: out.print("Ranch ");
}

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
double d = 2.5;
switch(d){
case 1.0: out.print("does");break;
case 1.5: out.print("this");break;
case 2.0: out.print("even");break;
case 2.5: out.print("work");break;
default :out.print("?");
}
problem.d: There is no output due to a compile error.
problem.e: There is no output due to a runtime error.

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
int x = 2;
switch( x % 5 ) {
   case 0 : out.print("T");
   case 1 : out.print("H"); break;
   case 2 : out.print("A");
   case 3 : out.print("N"); break;
   case 4 : out.print("X");
}

String s = "dog";
switch( s )
{
   case "dag" : System.out.print("7");
   case "dog" : System.out.print("8");
   case "dug" : System.out.print("9");
}

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
String d3 = "acbbeab";
int t = 0;
for(int i = 0; i < d3.length(); i++){
  switch( d3.charAt(i) ){
    case 'a' :
      t++;
      break;
    case 'b' :
      t += 2;
      break;
    case 'c' :
      t *= 3;
  }
}

System.out.print(t);

problem.question: What is the value of total after executing the code to the right?
problem.code:
int x = 42, total = 0;
while (x != 0) {
  switch(x%3) {
    case 0: total = total + 1; break;
    case 2: total = total - 1; break;
  }
  x = x/3;
}

problem.question: What is output by the code to the right?
problem.code:
double c = 2.5;
if( c > 1.5 ){
  if( c > 3 )
    c = c * 2;
  else
    c = c + 1;
}
System.out.print( c );
